rows.label: qst200412_0010
rows.name: The doctor and the loan shark?

rows.label: qst200412_0020
rows.name: So it would appear.

rows.label: qst200412_0030
rows.name: It seems there was merit to the hearsay.

rows.label: qst200412_0040
rows.name:
A doctor is meant to relieve the townsfolk's suffering,
not add to it.

rows.label: qst200412_0050
rows.name: We can't let this stand...

rows.label: qst200412_0060
rows.name: Vasara?!

rows.label: qst200412_0070
rows.name:
What about the woman?
Were you able to collect?

rows.label: qst200412_0080
rows.name:
Oh, there were complications, but we reached
an agreement. It'll be over soon.

rows.label: qst200412_0090
rows.name:
Hmph...
I should say it will.

rows.label: qst200412_0100
rows.name: Vasara!

rows.label: qst200412_0110
rows.name: Are they dead?

rows.label: qst200412_0120
rows.name:
No...
Simply knocked out.

rows.label: qst200412_0130
rows.name:
If we tie them up, Superbian guards
can collect them later.

rows.label: qst200412_0140
rows.name:
...That was a fine display, but I will say this.
Jumping in alone was an unnecessary risk.

rows.label: qst200412_0150
rows.name:
Right, what Meleph said!
What if there'd been more of them?

rows.label: qst200412_0160
rows.name: ...It was the right moment. I exercised my judgment.

rows.label: qst200412_0170
rows.name:
If we had wasted any more time,
they could have gotten away...

rows.label: qst200412_0180
rows.name:
which would in turn lead to the suffering
of many innocents...

rows.label: qst200412_0190
rows.name:
That one possibility, but we are comrades!
Should not forget to use teamwork!

rows.label: qst200412_0200
rows.name: ...Vasara?

rows.label: qst200412_0210
rows.name:
Why are you so set
on eradicating evil?

rows.label: qst200412_0220
rows.name:
...There is evil in this world which the law
is not equipped to deal with.

rows.label: qst200412_0230
rows.name:
Many shed tears and even blood
suffering in its shadow.

rows.label: qst200412_0240
rows.name: When a new lease on life was given to me...

rows.label: qst200412_0250
rows.name:
I felt a duty to use my power to help
uplift the downtrodden.

rows.label: qst200412_0260
rows.name:
As if it were the reason for my existence:
to punish all evil that lurks in this world.

rows.label: qst200412_0270
rows.name:
Punish all evil...
Well, if that doesn't sound noble, I don't know what does!

rows.label: qst200412_0280
rows.name:
Ah, so that will is where
all your might stems from...

rows.label: qst200412_0290
rows.name:
Well, anyhow.
We're allies now, right?

rows.label: qst200412_0300
rows.name: Trust us to help you!

rows.label: qst200412_0310
rows.name: ...I'll try.

rows.label: qst200412_0320
rows.name:
Well, whatever. At least we closed the case.
No need for all this scolding, am I right?

rows.label: qst200412_0330
rows.name: Ah, but it is not over yet.

rows.label: qst200412_0340
rows.name: Say what?

rows.label: qst200412_0350
rows.name:
We have indeed felled the doctor and the moneylender,
but many evildoers involved in the case are still at large.

rows.label: qst200412_0360
rows.name: Right...

rows.label: qst200412_0370
rows.name:
Well, in that case we'd best get to
tracking them sharpish!

rows.label: qst200412_0380
rows.name: No need.

rows.label: qst200412_0390
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst200412_0400
rows.name: How so?

rows.label: qst200412_0410
rows.name: This is my job.

rows.label: qst200412_0420
rows.name:
It does not seem fair to trouble you all
any further.

rows.label: qst200412_0430
rows.name: Please leave it to me.

rows.label: qst200412_0440
rows.name: Um, Vasara?

rows.label: qst200412_0450
rows.name: ...And he's gone.

rows.label: qst200412_0460
rows.name:
*sigh* It's like he didn't hear
a single word we said...
